companies.name: Sociala verktygslådan
companies.title: UX Consultant
companies.shortDescription: Improving user experience for an informal website aimed at social workers, families, and children.
fullDescription: Responsible for enhancing the usability and accessibility of the company’s informal website.
Focused on creating an intuitive and engaging interface to encourage visitors to stay longer, which positively impacts SEO.
Tailored the site’s structure, navigation, and tone to meet the needs of both professional users (social workers) and non-professional users (families and children).
Worked on SEO improvements to increase visibility and ensure content reaches the right audience.
This role is limited to the website and does not involve the company’s app or core product.

companies.name: Juke
companies.title: Fullstack Developer
companies.shortDescription: Developing a system that allows customers to queue songs via a web application in pubs and bars.
fullDescription: I am responsible for further developing a product that connects the web app to the bars’ Spotify accounts to enable song queuing directly in the bar’s music system.
The system aims to increase sales and customer dwell time by allowing them to influence the music selection via their mobile devices or computers.
Bars will be able to set filters and control the music played, for example, through themed days where only specific genres or decades, like 90s hits, can be queued.
A key part is refactoring the current iTunes integration to Spotify’s API to improve functionality and stability.
I’m also implementing a company-specific setup where bars can link their Spotify account through the website to grant the system permission to manage the queue using an API token.
